Dilovar lives in the region of Farkhor. He is 27 years old. He has is own family: a wife and two young daughters, who are 18 months and 3 years old. Dilovar is trained as a builder. For the last 9 months he has been helping his brother with his cattle rearing business. Dilovar gained significant experience in nurturing steers and now he would like to open his own business. 

He has a cowshed in his yard and has 900 dollars of starting capital. Dilovar also has a patch of land and he will grow food for the cattle on that land. Now Dilovar is asking for a loan to buy 6 bull-calves. He has already arranged everything required to start his new business and all he needs to do is to purchase the cattle and start the business. He awaits your support.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Hikmat

texts.ru: Хикмат добрая и порядочная женщина. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Хикмат вместе с мужем несколько лет находилась в Российской Федерации. Они подрабатывали разнорабочим. Хикмат недавно вернулась на родину, и теперь хочет организовать свой бизнес и зарабатывать на родине. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес купле продажей детской одежды. Хикмат с такой целью обратилась в ИМОН за займом. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки детской одежды, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Hikmat is a kind and decent woman. She is married, but does not have children. For several years, Hikmat and her husband have been abroad in the Russian Federation. They work part-time as laborers. Hikmat recently returned to their homeland, and now wants to start her own business and to earn a living at home. She wants to establish her own business buying and selling children's clothing.

With this aim, Hikmat turned to IMON for a loan. She is requesting a loan of US$3,000 to purchase children's clothing, in order to start a new business.

loans.use: to buy children clothes for organizing a new business

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic works hard to support her family. She is married and has an electronic mobile load business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for four years now.

Marivic requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional amount of electronic mobile load to sell to her customers.


Marivic would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional amount of electronic mobile load to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Inayat

texts.ru: Инаят 35 лет. Совместно с супругом воспитывают четверых детей. В 2012 году, супруги начали бизнес в торговле продуктами питания с арендованного магазина, используя в качестве стартового капитала сумму в 30,000 сом (KGS). Сумев развить свой бизнес и обретя постоянных клиентов, Инаят имеет среднемесячный доход в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS). Торговля развивается стабильно. В ассортименте - продукты питания, прохладительные напитки, детские игрушки. Благодаря упорному труду в бизнесе, супруги смогли купить скот - 1 дойную корову и одного теленка. В целях дальнейшего увеличения и расширения своего бизнеса, Инаят обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - для оптовой покупки продовольственных товаров, прохладительных напитков для последующей розничной торговли. Доходы от кредита Инаят планирует вложить в увеличение товарооборота и накопить деньги на строительство нового дома для своей семьи.
texts.en: Inayat is 35 years old. She and her husband are raising four children. In 2012 she and her husband began a grocery business in a rented store, with 30,000 som (KGS) in starting capital. Having started their own business and won regular customers, Inayat now has a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS). Sales have been stable. Their inventory includes foodstuffs, cold drinks, and children's toys. Thanks to their tireless work with the business, they can now buy livestock - a milk cow and calf. In the interest of further developing and expanding the business, Inayat contacted the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan to purchase wholesale consumer goods and drinks for future retail sale. She plans to invest income from use of the loan into further increasing their goods turnover, and she also plans to save money for construction of a new house for the family.

loans.use: to buy products wholesale for retail sale

loans.name: Leonor De Jesus

texts.es:
Leonor, necesita capital para invertir en surtir la tienda con lo que comprara bebidas, golosinas y granos básicos, aceite, jabón, detergente, etc., ya que son los productos que sus clientes buscan.
Con el préstamo anterior ella compro los mercadería con lo que fortaleció su negocio, tiene más clientes satisfechos, sus ganancias extras le permiten cancelar sus deudas y apoyar con los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Leonor needs capital so she can stock her store and buy beverages, snacks, basic grains, cooking oil, soap, detergent, etc.  because these are the products that her customers are looking for.

She used the money from the previous loan to strengthen her business.  She has more satisfied customers and her extra income allows her to pay her debts and support her family expenses.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнуре 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Айнуры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айнура занимается животноводством, стартовав 18 лет назад, с покупки скота на 2,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айнуры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 5 овец, дополнительно занимается полеводством, имеет 0,40 ГА поливной земли, на которой выращивает кукурузу, картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнура обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку телят для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айнура планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en:
Ainura is 42 years old, married, and with her spouse is raising four children. Ainura has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Ainura raises livestock, having begun 18 years ago with a livestock purchase of 2,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Ainura currently has on her homestead: three dairy cows, and five sheep, and additionally raises crops. She has 0.40 hectares of arable land, on which she grows corn and potatoes. Monthly income amounts to 5,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Ainura turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to buy calves for expanding her livestock count.

Ainura plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money for the further education of her children.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Sayda Lisseth

texts.es: Sayda es originaria de la ciudad de León, casada. De 24 años de edad. Ella es estudiante en una de las universidades de la ciudad. Su esposo es profesional y desea que Sayda también lo sea. Él lo apoya en lo que sea para que cumpla su meta y sea una mujer profesional con éxito en la vida.  Su mayor sueño es culminar su carrera para garantizarse un mejor futuro. Solicita el crédito para pagar el curso de titulación, con el fin de obtener su licenciatura. Su plan es apoyar a su esposo en el hogar.
texts.en: Sayda is from Leon.  She is 24,married, and studies at the local university.  Her husband is a professional and wants Sayda to be one as well.  He supports her however he needs so she can meet her goal and become a successful woman in life.  Her greatest dream is to complete her studies to guarantee a better future.  She is asking for a loan to pay tuition so she can obtain her degree.  Her plan is to support her husband in the home.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Zulaikho

texts.ru: Зулайхо 40 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Зулайхо - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Зулайхо занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Зулайхо, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 12 овец, также обрабатывает 2,53 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает -кукурузу и клевер. Полученный урожай реализуют оптовым поставщикам. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зулайхо обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Зулайхо планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Zulaikho is 40 years old, married, and with her spouse is raising three children. Zulaikho is a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Zulaikho raises livestock and crops, having begun 15 years ago with a livestock purchase of 10,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Zulaikho currently has on her farm: three dairy cows and 12 sheep, and also works 2.53 hectares of land, where she mainly grows corn and clover. She will sell the resulting crop to wholesalers. Monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Zulaikho turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to purchase sheep for expanding her livestock count.

Zulaikho plan to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Marcos Julio

texts.es:
Marcos tiene 31 años de edad, estado civil Unión Libre vive con su esposa  y con sus hijos de 6 y 9 años, Vive en el  Cantón Mocache provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla se llama Juntos Triunfaremos se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Jhon F. Kennedy 2, perteneciente al cantón Mocache cerca de Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Marcos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz desde hace algunos años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y arroz. El préstamo le ayudado a mejorar la economía de su familia y de sus cultivos. Su sueño es mejorar en los negocios
Le gusta practicar deportes.
texts.en:
Marco is 31 years old. He is in a free union relationship and lives with his wife and their children, ages 6 and 9. He lives in the Mocache canton in the province of Los Rios.

His communal bank is called "Juntos Triunfaremos" (Together We Will Triumph). It is located in the John F. Kennedy 2 district, which is part of the Mocache canton near Ventanas and works with agricultural and livestock-raising businesses.

Marcos works in agriculture. He has been planting corn and rice for several years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products in the market in the same place.

The loan that he has applied for is to purchase compost and fertilizers to plant corn and rice. The loan will help him to improve the economy of his family and his crops. His dream is to improve in business. He likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to plant rice.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a married man. He has five children. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a chemists where he sells medicine. He has been involved in this business for 7seven years. His business is located in a convenient place and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy more stock. He will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy extra stocks of medicine. His business goal is to expand within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be prosperous. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy extra stocks of medicine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase software, office equipment, and licenses.

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Заррина молодая замужняя женщнина в возрасте 25 лет. Она живет с мужем и трехлетним сыном в городе Худжанд. Ее муж занимается продажей машин. Сама Заррина сидит дома, но зарабатывает на жизнь. Она швея. Заррина по заказу шьет женские платья разных фасонов. Каждый ее заказ получается индивидуально красивым. Сейчас она просит кредит, чтобы расширить свое дело. На сумму кредита Заррина планирует купить новую швейную машинку и ускорить процесс своей работы. Таким образом она хочет увеличить количество своих клиенток.
texts.en: Zarrina is a young, married, 25 year old woman.  She lives with her husband and three year old son in the city of Khujand.  Her husband sells cars.  Zarrina stays home alone, but also earns a living as a seamstress.  Zarrina sews women's dresses of different styles to order.  Each of her orders has an individual beauty.  She is asking for a loan in order to expand her business.  With the money from the loan, Zarrina plans to purchase a new sewing machine and accelerate her work.  In this way, she hopes to increase her number of clients.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: El grupo “NUEVA ESPERANZA” se encuentra conformada por socios trabajadores y responsables en sus cuotas. Wilver tiene 36 años es casado con un hijo dependiente. El se dedica al trabajo de mantenimiento de aéreas verde en forma independiente. Años atrás se dedicaba a la construcción. Una de los proyecto de Wilber es implementar una pequeña bodega para que su esposa lo trabaje. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de herramientas raederas cortacésped y rastrillo. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Wilber es el segundo del lado derecho.
texts.en: The group "Nueva Esperanza" (New Hope) consists of hard-working members who are responsible with their payments. Wilver is 36 years old. He is married and has a dependent son. He works independently maintaining green areas. In the past he worked in construction. One of Wilver's projects is to set up a little store so that his wife can work it it. He will invest the loan in the purchase of tools, such as scrapers, a lawnmower, and a rake. The group is grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan offered. Wilver is the second one on the right side.

loans.use: to buy tools such as scrapers, a lawnmower, and a rake

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
Ernesto, se ha decidido por un nuevo crédito ya que es un medio que le facilita la realización de actividades dentro de su negocio en esta ocasión lo utilizara para cancelar mano de obra y una maquina desgranadora, para la recolección de la cosecha, de esta forma tendrá justo a tiempo su producto en casa.
El crédito anterior le facilito tener una cosecha abundante tanto que se ahorro la compra de granos en la época de verano, tuvo mejores ingresos, ha cancelado sus deudas y su familia se encuentra saludable. Sus hijos han aprendido el oficio de siembra de granos básicos.
texts.en:
Ernesto has decided to ask for another loan since it is a good way to facilitate the completion of his business activities. He is seeking this loan so that he can pay off his workers and a Sheller machine.  Both are used in harvesting his crops.

His previous loan helped facilitate the harvest and helped him earn enough money to purchase grains in the summer when they are cheaper.  He had a higher income, he paid off his debts, and his family is healthy.  Also, his children have learned how to plant and harvest basic grains.

loans.use: to pay off workers and a sheller machine.

loans.name: Mario Alcides

texts.es:
Mario, se dispone a recolectar la cosecha de maíz por lo que necesita capital para pagar mano de obra, que le ayudara a realizarlo.
A Mario la inversión anterior le dio buenos resultados como mejor cosecha, granos de calidad, ha cancelado su crédito y poco a poco ha ampliado el área de cultivo. Sus hijos le apoyan en las jornadas de trabajo.
texts.en:
Mario is getting ready to harvest his corn crops and he needs capital in order to pay the workers that will help him.

Mario's previous loan brought great results such as a better harvest, higher quality grains, he paid off the loan, and little by little he has increased his crop acreage.  His children help him do the work.

loans.use: to pay workers.

loans.name: Shakhlo

texts.ru: Шахло 27 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Шахло - высшее образование, она работает преподавателем кыргызского языка в местной школе, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Шахло занимается животноводством, стартовав 5 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Шахло, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 26 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Шахло обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Шахло планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Shakhlo is 27 years old, married, and with her spouse is bringing up two children. Shakhlo has a higher education. She works as a teacher of Kyrgyz language at a local school. As an additional source of income for her family, Shakhlo raises livestock, having begun 5 years ago with a livestock purchase of 20,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Shakhlo currently has on her farm: four dairy cows, 26 sheep. Monthly income amounts to 5,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Shakhlo applied to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to buy sheep for expanding her livestock count.

Shakhlo plans to invest income from the loan to further propagation of the quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Makhpuratkhan

texts.ru: Махпуратхан 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 6 детей. У Махпуратхан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Махпуратхан занимается животноводством, стартовав 11 лет назад, с покупки скота на 12,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Махпуратхан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Махпуратхан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Махпуратхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Makhpuratkhan is 42 years old, married, and with her spouse is raising six children. Makhpuratkhan has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Makhpuratkhan tends livestock, having begun 11 years ago with a livestock purchase of 12,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Makhpuratkhan currently has on her farm: two dairy cows and 20 sheep. Monthly income amounts to 11,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Makhpuratkhan turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to purchase cows for expanding her livestock count.

Makhpuratkhan plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Apiet

texts.ru: Апиет 61 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Апиет - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Апиет занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Апиет, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 35 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Апиет обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку лошадей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Апиет планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Apiet is 61 years old, married, and, together with her husband, is raising 3 children.  Apiet has a secondary education.  The major source of income for Apiet's family is Apiet's work in animal husbandry, which began 10 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 KGS.  Thanks to Apiet's hard work, she now has in her herd 1 milk cow and 35 sheep.  Her monthly income is 11,000 KGS.  With the goal of expanding her herd, Apiet turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase horses for breeding.  With the income she earns from the loan, Apiet plans to save for the further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to buy horses

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa es una microempresaria clienta de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia: 

Josefa tiene 41 años, es casada y tiene un hijo. Ella tiene un negocio de venta de tacos frente a una transitada terminal de camiones desde hace 11 años. 

Su puesto es de lámina fija y ahí vende tacos de suadero, longaniza, al pastor, alambres  y tripa. Le apoya su esposo atendiéndolo y tienen un empleado, sus clientes son ya de mucho tiempo y en su mayoría son los choferes de la terminal.

Este préstamo lo pide para costear un horno para carne que mandó a hacer con un herrero. Gracias al esfuerzo en su negocio Josefa se encuentra arreglando su casa poco a poco, y su reto es terminar este proyecto.
texts.en:
Josefa is a microentrepreneur who is a client of Kubo Financiero and this is her story:

Josefa is 41 years old, married and has one son. She has a business selling tacos outside a busy bus terminal for the last 11 years.

Her stall is fixed and she sells suadero tacos, sausages, alambres ( chicken & bacon tacos) & tripas (small intestines). Her husband supports her in the stall and they also have an employee. Their clients are long term customers and the majority of them are drivers from the terminal.

This loan is to pay for an oven to prepare the meat, which she has already ordered from a blacksmith. Thanks to her efforts with her business, Josefa is managing to fix up her house little by little and her challenge is to finish this project.

loans.use: pay for an oven to prepare meat for her business

loans.name: Mokhira

texts.ru: Мохире 44 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Мохиры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Мохира занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Мохиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 15 овец, на своем огороде также выращивает картошку и кукурузу. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Мохира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Мохира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Mokhira is 44 years old, married, and with her husband is raising three children. Mokhira has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Mokhira raises livestock, having begun 20 years ago with a livestock purchase of 1,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Mokhira currently has on her homestead: four dairy cows and 15 sheep; and in her garden she also grows potatoes and corn. Monthly income amounts to 5,000 som (KGS). With the aim of further developing her homestead, Mokhira turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to purchase sheep for expanding her livestock count.

Mokhira plans to invest income from the loan in further propagation of the quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce is a 34-year- old married woman. She has 2 children. She describes herself as being loyal and ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in a marketable place and her primary customers are regular customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. She will use the Ksh. 60,000 loan to buy stock of fruits and vegetables. Her business goal is to be a supplier of fruits and vegetables within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will save enough for her family. This is her third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy stock of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of clothes to sell in her business.

loans.name: Tohirkhon

texts.ru:
Тохирхон живет на районе Фархор. Ему 28 лет. Он женат и имеет полуторагодовалую дочь. 
  Раньше Тохирхон с братом помогали дяде присматривать за скотами. Дядя разводил скотов у себя дома. Сейчас брат Тохирхона находится за приделами Республики Таджикистана и Тохирхон накопил опыта в сфере животноводства, чтобы начать свой бизнес. Тохирхон надеется на сумму от кредита купить необходимое количество скотов, чтобы начать бизнес купли и продажи скотов. Для обоснования бизнеса у него имеется коровник и достаточный опыт, но чтобы реализовать задуманное, нет необходимой суммы денег, поэтому он просит ему помочь.
texts.en:
Tohirkhon lives in the Farkhor region. He is 28 years old. He is married and has a 1.5-year old daughter. 
In the past Tohirkhon and his brother used to help their uncle raise livestock. Their uncle used to keep livestock by his home. At present Tohirkhon's brother works outside of Tajikistan. Tohirkhon has now enough experience in raising livestock in order to launch his own business. He hopes to use this loan to buy a sufficient number of animals in order to launch his business buying and reselling cattle. He has a cowshed and plenty of experience, but lacks sufficient funds to realize his plans. This is why he is asking for help.

loans.use: to buy calves and launch his livestock business.

loans.name: Fidencia

texts.es: Fidencia de 60 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, todos mayores de edad, con ella vive solo su esposo, con quién comparte del todos los gastos del hogar. Desde muy joven aprendio a coser y siempre ha trabajado en eso, además vende cremas y perfumes. Sus proveedores son una tienda de telas en su comunidad, y un señor quien le trae las cremas y los perfumes. Su plan de inversión en la compra de telas, hilos, elásticos, botones, zipper y otros insumos para la confección de uniformes escolares. Su esperanza es tener mejor calidad de vida, ser una mujer independiente y no ser una obligación o una carga económica para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fidencia is 60 years old. She is married and has three children, all adults. She lives with just her husband, with whom she shares all the household expenses. She learned to sew when she was very young, and she has always done this work. In addition, she sells creams and perfumes. Her suppliers
are a fabric store in her community and a man who brings her the creams and perfumes. Her investment plan is to buy fabrics, thread, elastic, buttons, zippers, and other supplies to make school uniforms. Her hope is to have a better quality of life, to be an independent woman, and not to be an obligation or an economic burden to her children.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, zippers, and other supplies to make school uniforms

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a 58-year-old widowed woman who operates a tailoring business where she makes and repairs clothes. She has 8 children and describes herself as God fearing.  

Jane has been involved in this business for 8 years. Her business is located in a marketable place and her primary customers are both men and women. The 30,000 KES loan will be used to buy threads, zippers, fabric and other materials for clothes making.  

Her business goal is to be the leading tailor shop within 5 years and she hopes that in the future, she will open a tailoring school.  This is her second loan with SMEP DTM.  Her previous loan of 20,000 KES was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy threads, zippers, fabric and other materials for clothes making.

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru: Раъно начинающая бизнес леди. Она живет в городе Кургантюбе. Ей 47 лет. Раъно вдова и сама воспитывает двоих детей. Она сейчас активно готовится к открытию торгового бизнеса и уже арендовала место для продажи. Раъно планирует заняться продажей женской одежды. Ей будет помогать брат, который занят в этой сфере. К сожалению собственного сбережения Раъно не хватает  и поэтому она обратилась за кредитом. На сумму кредита она собирается закупить товар и начать торговлю.
texts.en: Ra'no is brand new business woman.  She lives in the city of Qurgan-Tube, and is 47 years old.  Ra'no is widowed and is raising two children by herself.  She is actively preparing to open a retail business and already rented a space in which she plans to sell women's clothing.  Her brother, who also works in this field, will help her.  Unfortunately, Ra'no does not have savings of her own, and for this reason she is asking for a loan.  With the money from the loan, she is planning to purchase goods and start selling.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal women's clothing to resell

loans.name: Mariely

texts.es:
Mariely es soltera y tiene 34 años, nació en la provincia Andres Ibáñez de Santa Cruz de la Sierra – Bolivia, no tiene hijos y vive con sus padres. Culmino sus estudios y se titulo en la carrera de Contaduría Pública de la Universidad Autónoma Gabriel Rene Moreno, actualmente quiere cursar una especialidad en Recursos Humanos, para lo cual solicitó un crédito educativo para poder financiar sus Estudios.

Mariely actualmente ejerce su profesión y es voluntaria para la realización de diferentes obras sociales. Ella manifiesta que quiere especializarse en el área de Recursos Humanos el cual complementará sus actuales conocimientos y de esta manera mejorará la administración de la empresa donde se desempeña.

Mariely ayuda económicamente en los gastos de su hogar, por lo cual sus ingresos no alcanzan para poder pagar la especialidad que desea realizar, lo que se constituye en un obstáculo para lograr la meta que se ha trazado. 

Mariely esta convencida de que las personas que sobresalen en la vida son aquellas que están dispuestas a luchar por sus sueños hasta alcanzarlos, ella se considera una de estas personas. 

Mariely de antemano agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a otros y generan nuevas oportunidades de crecimiento, así como a ella se le están otorgando ahora.
texts.en:
Mariely is single and she is 34 years old.  She was born in Andres Ibáñez de Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia. She does not have children and she lives with her parents.  She finished her studies and received a degree in Public Relations from the University Autónoma Gabriel Rene Moreno.  Currently she wants to take courses in Human Resources Management.  She is seeking a loan so that she can finance her studies.

Mariely currently works in a professional job and volunteers in a variety of social works programs.  She wants to specialize in Human Resources, which will complement her current expertise and will help her improve the administration in the company for which she currently works.

Mariely helps pay the household expenses and this is why her income is insufficient to pay for school.  This is an obstacle in achieving her goals.

Mariely believes that the people who survive in life are those that fight for their dreams and make them come true.  She considers herself one of these people.

Mariely would like to thank the people that are helping others financially because they are helping to generate new growth opportunities, which is now being granted to her.

loans.use: to pay for her graduate studies in Human Resources Management.

loans.name: Dildora

texts.ru: Трудное условие жизни заставляет человека направлять все свои усилия и мотивировать существующие ресурсы. Дилдора является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем, но не имеет  детей. Ее муж занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур. Его доход не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Дилдора решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем женской одежды, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Difficult life conditions cause a person to direct all their strengths and to motivate existing resources. Dildora is one of those personalities that tries to improve living conditions and to stimulate the economic well-being of the family. She is married, but does not have money. Her husband raises crops His income is not enough to support the family with all the necessities. Dildora decided to help her husband to provide for the family.

With this aim, she studied in the course "Bring on Success" organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. Now, she is fully able to start her own business and to become successful in this area. She wants to organize a business sewing women's clothing, since she has experience in this type of work.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine, in order to start a new business.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Farogat

texts.ru: Женщина, которая является хранительницей очага своего дома и опорой для своих детей, имеет грандиозную идею, организовать новый бизнес. Она много лет не имела источника дохода. Так как ее муж имеет маленькую зарплату и не в состоянии обеспечить своих детей со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Дети год за годом требуют больше благ, так как они развеваются вместе с развевающимся миром. Она решила организовать бизнес выращиванием пшеницы. Она долго искала помощь и наконец, она узнала о курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованной Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она участвовала на этом курсе и получила много позитива для себя. После завершения курса она получила сертификат. Теперь она готова начать бизнес, однако она не имеет денег, чтобы купить семена и минеральные удобрения. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки семена и минерального удобрения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: This woman, who is the guardian of the hearth in her home and a supporter for her children, has a grandiose idea to start a new business. For many years, she has not had a source of income. Since her husband has a small salary and is not in a business to support their children with all the necessities. The children year after year demand more care, since they are developing in a developing world. She decided to start a business growing wheat. She has long searched for help and finally took the course "Bring on Success" organized by the Association of Business Women. She took part in this course and gained a lot for herself. After finishing the course, she received a certificate. Now, she is ready to start a business, and at the same time does not have money to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 somoni to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for organizing a new business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a display case and stock (cosmetics, accessories, personal hygiene products, nail varnish and more) in bulk.

loans.name: Erkin

texts.ru: Эркин 38 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Эркин - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Эркин занимается животноводством, стартовав 17 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Эркин, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 лошадь, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эркин обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Эркин планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Erkin is 38 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising 3 children.  Erkin has a secondary education.  Erkin's work in animal husbandry, beginning 17 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 20,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to Erkin's hard work, she now has 1 horse and 10 sheep in her herd.  Her monthly income is 5,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing the size of her herd, Erkin turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the money from the loan, Erkin plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Mehry

texts.ru: Мехри родилась в 1968 году. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она замужем за преподавателя. Она занималась выращиванием сельхоз культур, но так как ее доход был маленьким, она решила организовать новый бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Мехри с такой целью участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она запрашивает займ для покупки швейной машинки. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Mehry was born in 1968. She is married and is raising three children. She is married to a teacher. She raises crops, but since her pay is small she decided to start a new business sewing women's clothing. Mehry with this aim participated in the course "Bring on Success" organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. She is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
Soy la señora maria eugenia, tengo 53 años, soy casada y tengo 3 hijos, ellos ya estan casados y vivo en casa propia. Mi negocio es de venta de dulces y juguetes, me dedico a esto desde hace 10 años. Soy una persona cumplida y responsable. Estoy solicitando el préstamo para comprar dulces y juguetes para las ventas de fin de año.
Mis principales logros es que con mi negocio y con la ayuda de mi esposo he podido sacar adelante a mi familia y me he podido comprar algunas cosas.
texts.en:
I'm Mrs Maria Eugenia, I'm 53 years old, married and have 3 children who are already married and I live in my own house. My business is selling sweets and games, which I've been doing for 10 years. I'm an accomplished and responsible person. I'm asking for this loan to buy sweets and games for end of year sales.

My main achievement is my business and with my husband's help, I've been able to help my family get ahead and also to buy a few things.

loans.use: to buy sweets and games to sell

loans.name: Yolonda

texts.en:
Yolonda has always wanted to start her own business, but this mother of two decided to instead focus all of her energy on raising her young children. Now that her children are in their teens, Yolonda realized that it was time to pursue her own dreams.

Yolonda, who is currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree, decided to become a travel agent after six years of helping her church community organize travel arrangements. She established Destiny Worldwide Tours, a business that allows Yolonda to give her clients a “human touch” that they can’t get from online travel sites. 

Yolonda wants to expand her business beyond her church community and formalize her business. With your loan contribution, Yolanda can take her business to the next level and set up a home office where she can meet her clients; also purchase a computer, buy airline-booking and trip-planning software, and develop a website.

Help make 2014 the year when Yolanda’s dream to become a successful entrepreneur becomes a reality.

loans.use: to set up a home office, purchase a computer, buy airline-booking and trip-planning software, and develop a website.

loans.name: Mabel

texts.en: Mabel is a 51-year-old married woman. She has three children between the ages of 10 and 25. She describes herself to be a visionary. She operates a butchery where she sells meat. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in an urban area and she has a number of regular customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the perishability of meat. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to open another butchery and buy more meat. Her business goal is to be the best within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will expand her business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children. She also does farming to earn more income.

loans.use: to open another butchery and buy meat

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.ru: Одилчон начинающий фермер, живет в районе Спитамен. Ему 34 года. Он женат, имеет детей. Одилчон в данный момент собирается начать земледельческую деятельность. Он арендовал 3 га орошаемого участка земли на бессрочный срок. Одилчон уже обработал землю, закупил семена пшеницы. Он планирует каждый год выращивать пшеницу и иметь доход от продажи зерна. Сейчас он обратился за кредитом, чтобы закупить минеральные удобрения. Весной он хочет собрать хороший и качественный урожай. Одилчон знает, что справится. Он хорошо осведомлен о земледельческой деятельности. Сейчас ему нужна только финансовая поддержка.
texts.en:
Odiljon is a beginning farmer and lives in the Spitamen region. He is 34 years old. He is married and has children. Odiljon currently intends to start agricultural activities. He has rented three hectares of irrigated land for an indefinite period. Odiljon already prepared the land and bought wheat seeds. He plans every year to grow wheat and to have income from selling grains.

Now, he applied for a loan to buy mineral fertilizers. In the spring, he wants to collect a good and high-quality crop. Odiljon knows how to cope. He is knowledgeable about agricultural activities. Now, he is in need only of financial support.

loans.use: to acquire mineral fertilizers for a wheat crop

loans.name: Las Palomitas Group

texts.es: Maria tiene 42 años es conviviente con 02 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica al cuidado de niños hace muchos años. Es de esta manera que puede apoyar a su esposo  quien se dedica a prestar servicios de  mecánica. Uno de sus hijos se encuentra  la universidad. El préstamo lo invertirá en el pago de la matricula universitario de su hijo. Su mayor deseo es terminar de construir su vivienda. En el grupo “LAS PALOMITAS” cumple la función de presidenta. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Maria es la segunda persona sentada del lado derecho.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 years old.  She lives with her partner and her two dependent children.  For many years, she has worked caring for children.  In this way she can support her husband, who works as a mechanic.  One of her children is in college.  She will use the loan to pay the university registration fees for her child.  

Her biggest desire is to finish construction on her home.  She serves as President of the “Las Palomitas” credit group.  The group is thankful to Kiva investors for the loan that was given to them.  Maria is the second person seated from the righthand side [in the photo].

loans.use: to pay for registration fees at the university.

loans.name: Elphas

texts.en:
Elphas is a 33-year-old married man with 3 children ranging in age from 2 years old to 10 years old.  He describes himself as honest. 

For 5 years he has operated a garage where he repairs motor vehicles.  His business is located in an urban area and his primary customers are regular customers.  Elphas will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy spare parts and equipment for repairing vehicles.  His business goal is to be the best within 5 years and to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and equipment for repairing vehicles.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Doña Ángela  es una persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora, es soltera y  vive con sus hijos en la comunidad al sur de Honduras. 
Doña Ángela su negocio es una pulpería, el préstamo lo necesita para la compra  de  azúcar, café, pan, frijoles, manteca,  carne,  etc. Con el préstamo espera un aumento de las ventas debido a que contara con más producto  que ofrecer a los clientes que lo visitan por que para esta temporada navideña se vende mucho este tipo de producto y espera  así poder cubrir sus necesidades.
Doña Ángela así mismo desea que su estilo de vida y el de familia mejore  y se vea reflejado con esta inversión. En unos años el sueña con que su negocio este posicionado como el más grande y  conocido de la zona y poder seguir apoyando a su familia  a que se conviertan en personas de bien y con mejores oportunidades.



Choluteca, Honduras –Diciembre  del 2013
texts.en:
Ángela is an honest, responsible, and hard-working person.  She is single and lives with her children in a community in southern Honduras.

Ángela’s business is a grocery store.  She needs the loan to buy sugar, coffee, bread, beans, shortening, and meat, etc.  With the loan she hopes to increase her sales because she will have more products to offer her customers who visit her.  During this Christmas season this type of product sells a lot.  She hopes to be able to cover her necessities.

Ángela wishes that her lifestyle and that of her family improves and can be seen through this investment.  In a few years she dreams that her business will be positioned as the biggest and most well-known in the area.  She wishes to be able to continue supporting her family and that they become good people with better opportunities.

Choluteca, Honduras – December, 2013

loans.use: to buy sugar, coffee, bread, beans, shortening, and meat, etc.

loans.name: Tashwar

texts.en:
Tashwar, originally from Guyana, came to the United States when he was still a child. He is now an accountant at a large company in Florida, but with over five years of accounting experience under his belt and a newborn daughter at home, Tashwar has been motivated to start a business of his own.

This hardworking entrepreneur aspires to start a business that provides tax and accounting service to small business owners that cannot afford their own full-time staff or costly accounting firms. With the new addition to his family, starting a successful business is the first step in a big future Tashwar envisions for himself, his wife, and his daughter. 

You can help Tashwar build a brighter future for his family by helping him build his business. With your contribution to his loan goal, Tashwar will be able to pay for registration fees, office supplies, and certified software.

Help Tashwar today!

loans.use: to pay for registration fees, office supplies, and certified software.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina, es casada, vive junto a su hija y dos nietos, ella es la jefa del hogar, para proveer a su familia de lo necesario se dedica a vender tortillas  y pupusas, lo hace de 6:0 a.m. a 8:00 p.m., de lunes a domingo, para ella es una actividad que no representa ningún problema ejercerla.
Reina invertirá en la compra de mesas para y bancas, para su negocio, le ayudara a dar una mejor imagen a su negocio, mejorara la atención. Espera atraer más clientes, mejorar la rentabilidad y fortalecer las ganancias, con las cuales podrá cancelar sus deudas así como también seguir cubriendo los gastos familiares.
Aspira a tener un chalet para crecer en su negocio y brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Reina is married and lives with her daughter and two grandchildren. She is the head of household. In order to provide for her family, she works selling tortillas and pupusas. She does this from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm, Monday through Sunday. For her this is a business that she can carry on without any problems.

Reina will invest in purchasing tables and benches for her business. This will help her give her business a better image and improve service. She expects to attract more customers, improve profitability, and strengthen her earnings so that she can pay off her debts as well as continue to cover her family's expenses.

Her goal is to have a small store in order to expand her business and make her customers more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy tables and benches.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a 36-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are still in school. 

Marivic is a very hard working entrepreneur. She has a handicraft business in the Philippines and she requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more materials like shells, nylon threads, wires, cutters, etc. for her business.

Marivic has been in this business for 10 years and in the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more materials like shells, nylon threads, wires, cutters, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mujeres Las Trabajadoras (Hardworking Women) Group

texts.en:
This group of four hard working women, from the village of San Andrés Villa Seca, Retalhuleu, Guatemala, are starting their second nine-month cycle with the Namaste Foundation.  As with their first cycle, they will receive a business advisor who will help them write a business plan and then work with them monthly to implement that plan.  They will also receive a loan and some financial education.  These women are all illiterate and have businesses selling different types of food.

Manuela (2nd from right) is 30 years old and married with five children, ages 2, 6, 9, 12 and 15.  The four oldest children are in school.  Her husband works in agriculture and helps her with household and family expenses.  They live in a house made of corrugated metal and her dream is to increase her sales and profits enough to build a proper house for her family.

For 13 years she has been selling fish, vegetables and tomatoes in her village.  She has a lot of experience selling these products and is well known and respected in her community.  These factors have allowed her to sell a lot of product.  At the end of her first nine-month cycle with Namaste she had profits of 3,729 Guatemalan Quetzales (approximately US $497).  She was very successful at growing her business during that cycle and in the last few months she increased her profits by an average of 30% per month.  She would like to maintain that growth rate and projects profits of 7,586 Quetzales (about US $960) by the end of this cycle.  With her loan she will be buying more product to sell, and in the coming months she will be exploring new markets and continuing to improve the administration of her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Lumiere Celeste 1-5 Group

texts.fr:
Augustin est le coordinateur de son groupe Lumiere Celeste 1-5. Il habite dans la région de Grande Savanne, d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Il a dirigé son commerce de produit divers pendant 6 années. Augustin est marié et a 3 enfants.

Augustin voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l'achat de chaussures, vetement, cosmetiques, etc. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres Lumière Celeste ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme charbon, produit divers, vetement. Augustin dit que ses défis principal est deveniez une grande commerçant. Il dit que son but principal et son rêve est possède une gros business avec sa propre fond avec la mercy de Dieu.
texts.en:
Augustin is the coordinator for his group, Lumiere Celeste 1-5 (Celestial Light). He lives in the region of Grande Savanne in Haiti, where electricity is rare and water access is very limited. He has managed his trade of various products for six years. Augustin is married and has three children.

Augustin would like to use this loan to invest in the purchase of shoes, clothing, cosmetics, etc. He hopes that this loan will help him grow his business. Other members of Lumiere Celeste need a loan for such trades as charcoal, various products, and clothing. Augustin says that his main challenge is to become a major retailer. He says that his main goal and his dream is to own a large business with his own capital, with God’s mercy.

loans.use: to buy various shop items.

loans.name: Las Semillitas Group

texts.es: El grupo “Las Semillitas” está conformada por 06 socios responsables y dinámicos. Jorge de 33 años es soltero y no tiene hijos. Hace más de 08 años que Jorge cuenta con un taller, la cual brinda servicio de pintados para carros, motos, bicicletas y triciclos. Gracias a lo que percibe puede seguir apoyando a su madre, pues ella ha sido su motivo para seguir adelante. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de materiales como pinturas, lijas y resinas. El deseo de Jorge es de seguir prosperando su negocio. La Alcancía Comunal “Las Semillitas” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Jorge se encuentra en la parte posterior es el tercero de la izquierda y viste camisa ploma.
texts.en:
The group “Las Semillitas” (Little Seeds) has six responsible, dynamic members. Jorge is 33, single, and doesn't have any children. Over 8 years ago, he started a workshop, which provides painting services for cars, motorbikes, bicycles and tricycles. Thanks to what he earns, he can continue to support his mother, who has been his reason for carrying on.

This is why Jorge is asking for the loan to buy material such as paint, sandpaper and resins. His desire is to continue making his business prosper. The communal bank “Las Semillitas” is grateful to the people who make this loan possible. Jorge is in the back of the photo, third from the left, wearing a grey shirt.

loans.use: to buy materials such as paint, sandpaper and resins.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Telman

texts.en: Telman has a store. He is 37 years old, married and has two sons. One of them is going to fourth grade and another is going to second grade of school. His wife is a housewife. They are live in Baku region. It’s noted that Telman has a store, where he sells fresh meat. Today he wants to increase his business. Telman wants to increase the area of his store and wants start to sell vegetables and fruits. For this reason he needs a loan in amount of 2100 AZN(Azerbaijan New Manat). Telman is greatly thankful to Kiva and its lenders for help. In the future he wants to buy new fridge.

loans.use: expand the area of his store to sell vegetables and fruits

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
With over 25 years of experience in the security and law enforcement field, U.S. Army veteran Charles certainly has a passion for protection.

Naturally, when Charles decided it was time to open his own business, he turned to what he knows best: privacy and protection. In June 2013, he established a protective services company. Through the business, Charles offers dependable security consulting and patrol services. He also provides security training to companies that want to learn how to best keep their office and employees safe. 

“We are dedicated to helping businesses, individuals, and even other security agencies receive the qualified security personnel and security services they need.”

This year, as Charles approaches the one year anniversary of his business’s opening, he is looking to invest more time towards the business and make it a success – but first, he needs your help. With your contribution, Charles will gain working capital and be able to pay for equipment, uniforms, vehicle wrap advertisements, and license fees. With your help, Charles will be able to grow his business and will be one step closer to reaching his dream of one day providing security services to government agencies. 

Learn more about Charles’s business at Paceprotect.com.

loans.use: to pay for equipment, uniforms, vehicle wrap advertisements, and license fees for his protection services company.

loans.name: La Fidelite De Ouanaminthe Group

texts.fr:
Augustin est  La coordinateur de son groupe  Fidelite de Ouanaminthe. Il est mariee et Il a 6 enfants. Il  habite dans la region nord est d`Haïti ou de électricité est rare et de l'éau portable est très limitée. Il tient une boutique pendant les 8 dernieres années. 

Avant de faire ce commerce Il  fait la couture, Augustin va acheter des vêtements et des chaussures. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à grandir son business.  Des autres membres de son groupe La Fidelite de Ouanaminthe ont besoin d’un  emprunt pour faire le commerce tel que ventes produits alimentaires, boissons gazeuses,  nourritures, etc.  

Augustin  dit que son défit  principal est de devenir une plus grande commerçante. Il dit son but principal c’est d’avoir un plus grand business qui lui facilitera à un plus grand trafique  avec les prêts de Esperanza.
texts.en:
Augustin is the coordinator for his group, Fidelite (Loyalty) of Ouanaminthe. He is married and has six children. He lives in the north-eastern region of Haiti, where electricity is rare and access to drinking water is very limited. He has managed a shop for the past eight years.

Before working in retail, he worked in tailoring. Augustin will purchase clothing and shoes. He hopes that this loan will help him grow his business. Other members of his group La Fidelite de Ouanaminthe need a loan to run their businesses such as the retail of food products, soft drinks, food supply, etc.

Augustin says that his main challenge is to become a larger retailer. He says that his main goal with Esperanza’s loans is to own a bigger business, which will make it easier for him to increase store traffic.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en:
Benjamin is a 36-year-old married man. He has one child who is 3 years old. He describes himself to be honest.

He operates a retail business where he sells tomatoes, onions and other vegetables, and he has been involved in this business for 1 year. His business is located in a local area and his primary customers are regular customers. He describes his biggest business challenges to be competition from other sellers and perishability of vegetables.

He will use the 10,000 KES loan to add more stock of vegetables and fruits. His business goal is to be the best within 5 years. He hopes that he will expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to add more stock of vegetables and fruits

loans.name: Safarbek

texts.ru:
Сафарбек - житель района Яван - начинает новый бизнес. Он собирается заняться куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. Для ведения данного бизнеса он создал все условия. При дворе дома Сафарбек построил коровник, запасся кормом для скота, и теперь осталось только закупить скот. Для осуществления данного намерения он просит кредит, так как его сбережения не хватает. На сумму кредита Сафарбек собирается купить 4 голов крупнорогатого скота. 
К тому же Сафарбек является садоводом. У него имеется участок земли, где растут яблони. Он будет совмещать садоводство с животноводством. По словам Сафарбека, работа садовода сезонная и поэтому он начинает новый бизнес чтобы обеспечить себя постоянной работой.
texts.en: Safarbek is a resident of the region of Yavan, and is starting a new business in the purchase and selling of cattle.  He has given all of his effort to start this business - near Safarbek's home he has built a barn and feeding troughs, and now all that is left is to purchase cattle.  He is asking for a loan to accomplish this because he lacks personal savings.  With money from the loan, Safarbek plans to buy 4 head of cattle.  Up until now, Safarbek worked in gardening.  He has a plot of land on which grow apple trees, and wants to combine gardening and animal husbandry.  According to Safarbek, gardening is seasonal work, and he is starting his new business so that he can be working constantly.

loans.use: to purchase 4 head of cattle

loans.name: Karol Stephanie

texts.es:
Ella es karol, tiene 27 años, desde la niñez le apasiona el tema de la salud y el ayudar a los demás, pero como todo el mundo la vida no fue fácil. Tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar medicina y por problemas económicos tuvo que dejarlo, después de enfrentar una dura realidad con la familia, ya que no contaba con el apoyo de ninguno de ellos, decidió tomar decisiones frente a la vida, y es así como se fue de la casa.
Allí se dedicó a buscar un trabajo para mantenerse y volver a estudiar y por eso comenzó con enfermería, es así como ingreso a estudiar, logro llegar a tercer semestre, realizo prácticas en el hospital de Fontibón, pero lo que no sabía era que estaba embarazada, tenía 4 meses de gestación, se vino a dar cuenta por unos exámenes de rutina que tuvo que realizarse por chequeo médico y valla sorpresa. 
En ese momento ella  lloraba porque no sabía que hacer, recuerda que al ver la primera ecografía solo le importaba saber si el bebe estaba bien, si no le faltaba nada y lloro de alegría.

Gracias a Dios, a pesar de todo el bebe nació sano y salvo, espero cumplir la licencia y renuncio a donde estaba trabajando, duró 2 meses mas con el bebe en la casa y se dedicó a buscar trabajo, así  llego a donde actualmente está trabando, un lugar donde le dieron la oportunidad de superarse y salir adelante y donde  ha podido darle todo a el hijo sin que le falte nada. 
Ella quería retomar los estudios,  y se puso a buscar, fue así como se inscribió por Internet a Campo Alto además que ella buscaba poder realizar las prácticas en la noche y que no interfiriera con el trabajo. 
Al comenzar primer semestre todo iba bien hasta que comenzó a verse alcanzada por los gastos, pero aun así, siempre ha sido ordenada con los pagos y pendientes, siempre se ha determinado por ser una gran estudiante y sobre todo la dedicación que le pone a lo que hace, al final del semestre pasado se vio un poco preocupada por que no podría cancelar lo que debía del semestre pero al fin logro conseguirlo y cancelar, todavía lo debe pero hay va poco a poco, como le fue tan bien académica mente pide el convenio con kiva, esto le ayudaría  para no verse tan preocupada cada mes con la mensualidad y seria de una gran ayuda para así ella cumplir las metas, proyectos y poder demostrase a ella y a al hijo que puede salir adelante sin la ayuda de nadie. Además que el pequeño bebe ya entra al jardín este año y eso genera más gastos. Bueno esta es la historia de  karol una gran guerrera, que campo alto ha sido una gran oportunidad de superación y grandes oportunidades que le brindan a los estudiantes.
texts.en:
This is Karol. She is 27 years old. Since childhood, she has loved the field of health and helping others, but, like everybody else, her life has not been easy. She had the opportunity to study medicine, but had to give it up because of financial problems. After going through a difficult situation with her family, she no longer had their support. She decided to make a life decision, and that is when she left home.

At that point, she was determined to find a job to support herself and to return to her education, so she got started with nursing. She enrolled in school, made it to her third semester, and was doing clinical practice in the Fontibón hospital. What she didn't know what that she was pregnant; she was four months along. She found out through routine exams that she had to do at a check-up, and wow... surprise.

At that moment, she was crying because she didn't know what to do. She recalls that upon seeing the first ultrasound, all that mattered to her was knowing whether the baby was okay, whether it had all its fingers and toes, and that she cried with joy.

Thank God, despite everything, the baby was born safe and sound. She waited to complete her degree and she quit her job. She stayed home two months with the baby and then began looking for work. That's how she ended up where she is currently working; it's a place where they gave her a chance to better herself and to support herself, and she has been able to give her son everything he needs.

She wanted to return to her education, and she started looking for a way. That's how she registered online at Campo Alto; she also wanted to be able to do her clinical practice at night and for her studies not to interfere with her job. 

Upon starting her first semester, everything went well until she started to be overwhelmed by her expenses. Even then, she has always stayed on top of her payments and outstanding items. She has always been determined to be a great student and above all, to be dedicated to what she does. At the end of the last semester, she was a little worried because she couldn't pay off what she owed for that semester, but in the end she managed to come up with the money and pay it off. She still owes, but she is getting there little by little. 

Because she did so well academically, Karol is asking for Kiva's support. This will help her to not be so worried every month about her payments, and it would be a great help toward her being able to fulfill her goals and plans and be able to prove to herself and to her son that she can make it without anyone's help. In addition, her little baby is already starting at nursery school this year, and that will be an additional expense. 

So that is the story of Karol, a real warrior, and of how Campo Alto has been a great chance for her to overcome her challenges, as they provide great opportunities to their students.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en: Herminia is a 47-year-old married woman from Cortes, Bohol. Her husband works as a farmer and driver to provide for their family. Herminia, on the other hand, sells Avon products to augment their income. She also sells clothing in the community. Herminia is requesting a loan to buy more items to sell such as lotion, perfume, sandals, shoes and body talc. In the future, she hopes to save her income and be able to save for old age.

loans.use: to buy lotion, perfume, sandals, shoes and body talc.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El Señor Carlos es de la ciudad de Santaní, tiene casa propia, con hijos y comenta que es dueño de una despensa bien surtida que tiene en su casa. Es una persona muy trabajadora, que día a día se esfuerza por poder dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna.
Es un señor muy trabajador, responsable y muy honesto, empezó a trabajar como vendedor ambulante recorría todo los días y soñaba de tener una despensa bien surtida. Hoy ya cuenta con su propio negocio cuenta con clientela formada con buenos ingresos mensuales.
Carlos pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos generales para su despensa, ya que quiere poder surtirlo con todo tipo de productos, y que así sus clientes siempre estén satisfechos.
texts.en:
Carlos is from the city of Santaní.  He has his own house and children.  He says that he has a well-stocked store in his house.  He is a very hard-working person, who puts forth great effort day to day in order to be able to give his family everything they need for a decent life.

He is a hard-working, responsible, and very honest man.  He started working as an itinerant salesman.  He traveled every day and dreamed of having a well-stocked store.  He now has his own business, and he has a customer base with good monthly income.

Carlos is requesting this loan to buy general supplies for his store.  He wants to be able to stock it with all types of products.  This way his customers will always be satisfied.

loans.use: to buy general supplies to stock his store.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es un joven emprendedor, con ganas de salir adelante; a sus 21 años de edad quiere aprovechar la oportunidad de adquirir su negocio propio, pues le están ofreciendo para la venta, una legumbrería que ya tiene una trayectoria en el sector y es reconocida por la comunidad; la ventaja es que vive al frente del local, por lo que no tendría que gastar dinero en transporte y así podría lograr mayor rentabilidad en su negocio.
Esto lo motiva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que comprará el establecimiento, realizará adecuaciones locativas y abastecerá el negocio con más variedad de productos (frutas y verduras), así podrá iniciar con su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar recursos para aportar a la economía familiar, además desea prestar un buen servicio a sus clientes ofreciéndoles productos frescos y de muy buena calidad, para aumentar las ventas diarias.
Juan es consciente que para lograr los resultados esperados, debe trabajar con disciplina y constancia, pues de ello depende mantener el reconocimiento en el sector y su permanencia en el tiempo, además quiere ir fortaleciendo poco a poco su negocio y hacerlo crecer, para mejorar la rentabilidad y garantizar una estabilidad económica favorable para mejorar la calidad de vida de su grupo familiar.
texts.en: Juan is a young entrepreneur who wants to get ahead in life. He is only 21 but wants to seize the chance of buying a shop of his own. He has been offered a vegetable shop that already has a strong customer base and is well-known in the vicinity. He has the advantage of living across the shop, which would mean no transportation costs and thus better profits. This is why he decided to ask for a loan in order to buy the shop. He will adapt the locale a bit and replenish the stock in order to have a greater variety of fruits and vegetables on offer. This will be the start of his project, thanks to which he hopes to generate income in order to help his family. He aims to provide good service to his customers by offering fresh produce of the finest quality, so as to increase daily sales. Juan knows very well that, in order to achieve the results he hopes for, he will have to apply himself to his task with both discipline and diligence. These are key elements to keep up with the established reputation of the shop and guarantee it will last. His goal in the long term is to strengthen his business and to make it grow, in order to increase his profits and to guarantee a good degree of economic stability so as to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a shop, adapt the locale and replenish the stock.

loans.name: Silvia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Silvia, quiere aprovechar la temporada navideña para tener ingresos extras, por lo que está solicitando capital para invertirlo en la compra de vestidos, camisas, pantalones y ropa para niños, con esto su inventario se verá más surtido y ofrecerá a sus clientes mejores opciones de compra.
Con el crédito anterior ella fortaleció su negocio con diferentes estilos de ropa, permitiéndole satisfacer a sus clientes, tener más ventas y obtener ingresos con los cuales cancelar sus cuotas, así mismo dar a su familia un estilo de vida diferente.
texts.en:
Silvia wants to take advantage of the Christmas season to earn extra income, thus she is soliciting capital to invest in the purchase of dresses, shirts, pants and children’s clothing. This inventory will allow her to offer her customers better options for shopping.

She used the earlier loan to strengthen her business with different kinds of clothing. which allowed her to satisfy her customers and make more sales. Her earnings enabled her to pay her debts and give her family a different lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase dresses, shirts, pants and children's clothing.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, es casado, no tiene hijos, vive con su esposa, aprendió de su tía a vender ropa como un medio para generar ganancias, desde hace tres años es independiente en el negocio, lo realiza todos los días junto a su esposa.
El crédito lo utilizara para comprar ropa para dama y caballero, y así aprovechar esta la época navideña, espera aumentar las ventas, tener mejores ingresos, atraer nuevos clientes, cancelar la deuda adquirida y tener un mejor estilo de vida.
Sueña con fortalecer más su negocio y formar un patrimonio para su esposa y sus futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos is married and lives with his wife. He doesn't have any children. He learned how to sell clothing as a means to generate profit from his aunt. He has been running his own business for three years now and works every day alongside his wife.

He will use this loan to buy men and women's clothing and make the most of the Christmas season. He expects sales to increase, income to improve, and also to reach more customers. This will allow him to pay off the debt and have better living standards.

His dream is to further strengthen his business and develop an estate for his wife and future children.

loans.use: to buy men and women's clothing.

loans.name: Tarikhan

texts.ru: Тарихан 49 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Тарихан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Тарихан занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Тарихан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 50 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тарихан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Тарихан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Tarikhan is 49 years old, married, and, with her spouse, is raising 3 children.  Tarikhan has a secondary education.  Tarikhan's work in animal husbandry, which began 20 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to thTarikhan's hard work, she now has in her herd 3 milk cows and 50 sheep.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing her herd, Tarikhan turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the income from the loan Tarikhan plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd, and also plans to save towards her children's education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Gulsyina

texts.ru: Гулсыйне 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 1 сына. У Гулсыйны - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулсыйна занимается животноводством, стартовав 3 года назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулсыйны, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулсыйна обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулсыйна планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение сына.
texts.en: Gulsyina is 32 years old and she is married with one son.  She has a high school education and she raises livestock as the main source of income for her family.  She started this business three years ago with the purchase of livestock for 10,000 som KGS.  Thanks to her hard work, Gulsyina now has two dairy cows and ten sheep on her farm.  Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS).  With the goal of developing her business further, Gulsyina has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to buy cows to increase her head of livestock.  She plans to use the income from the loan to further increase her head of livestock, as well as to save up money for her son's education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Bubuaisha

texts.ru: Бубуайше 61 год, вдова, одна воспитывает сына. У Бубуайши - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бубуайша занимается животноводством, стартовав 18 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Бубуайши, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 2 нетели, 5 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бубуайша обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Бубуайша планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Bubuaisha is 61 years old, widowed, and is raising her son alone.  Bubuaisha has a secondary education.  Bubuaisha's work in animal husbandry, which began 18 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to Bubuaisha's hard work, her herd now contains 1 milk cow, 2 heifers, and 5 sheep.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing her herd, Bubuaisha turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the income from the loan, Bubuaisha plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Mujeres Del Rosario (Women Of The Rosary) Group

texts.en:
The six women of this group live in Margaritas del Rosario, Suchitepéquez, Guatemala.  They named their group in honor of the Virgin from their church, which unfortunately was stolen some years ago.  These are all hard-working women who are eager for the opportunity to be in Namaste’s business development program where they will work with a business advisor, take classes in managing their finances, and receive a small loan.  The businesses they have include sales of food, vegetables, fruits, and second-hand clothing.  There is also a seamstress. 

Angelica Maria (3rd from left) is 25 years old and lives with her domestic partner and their daughter, who goes to school.  She and her partner share household and family expenses.  She has a sixth grade education but her family was poor and she was not able to follow her dream of learning to be a seamstress.  However, with the help of a neighbor she taught herself to sew and now has her own small tailor shop.  She has a very positive attitude and, having acquired the sewing skills she always wanted, she is eager to acquire the business skills that will help her be successful in her business.

She plans to invest her loan money in new fabric so she can make more of the beautiful blouses typical of her area of Guatemala.  At the moment, she has monthly profits of 751 Guatemalan Quetzales (around US $95), working 70 hours per month.  She is aiming at an increase of 8% in profits over the course of her nine-month cycle with Namaste.

loans.use: to buy more fabric for producing the typical blouses of her area

loans.name: Ronald Christian

texts.es: Ronald es un joven emprendedor de 23 años de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Es hijo único y vive con la familia de su mamá. Estudió en el colegio estatal “Bolívar”, al culminar el colegio comenzó la carrera de Ingeniería Industrial en la universidad pública. Con mucho sacrificio por la distancia de su casa a la universidad, logró ser un estudiante sobresaliente lo que le hizo merecedor del premio a la innovación en su carrera. Actualmente trabaja en una fábrica de plásticos, cuyos ingresos los utiliza principalmente para apoyar económicamente en los gastos de su hogar.
